description: This file defines the AppDatabase class, which sets up the Room database for managing Note entities within an Android application. It includes a singleton pattern for database instance management and provides an abstract method for accessing Note data through NoteDao.

classes.name: AppDatabase
classes.description: Abstract class extending RoomDatabase for managing database operations related to Note entities. Implements singleton pattern to ensure a single database instance throughout the app.

methods.name: getInstance
methods.description: Provides a thread-safe singleton instance of AppDatabase, creating it if necessary, using Room's database builder with fallback to destructive migration.

methods.name: noteDao
methods.description: Abstract method to retrieve the DAO object for Note-related database operations.
